definition[0]: to not make use of a chance to do something
example[0]: I don’t think you should pass up the opportunity to go to university.
definition[1]: to not use the chance etc to do or have something when it is offered
example[1]: You wonder, when you pass up a deal like that, whether you’ll ever get one again.
example[2]: Even careful consumers are finding these bargains too good to pass up.
